attributes.action: Southeastern to not change their train times in May
attributes.background: From 20th May, southeastern railway are changing their train times drastically and cutting out hundreds of journeys. I have to get the train to school and these train times mean I can’t make it to school on time and mean I will get home from school much later than before.

rejection.details:
This petition is calling on Southeastern, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

You could start a new petition asking the Government to urge Southeastern not to make these changes to its timetable, if that's what you would like to happen.
